class.name: SteamMultiplayerPeer
class.brief_description: Works on top of GodotSteam. Allows you to use the Steam networking service as a multiplayer peer.
class.description: Extends MultiplayerPeer and provides a bridge between Steam Networking Sockets and Godot's high level multiplayer API.

method.name: writeScreenshot
method.description: Writes a screenshot to the user's Steam screenshot library.

signal.name: lobby_created
signal.description: Gets called on successfully creating a lobby and a game server.

signal.name: lobby_createdd
signal.description: Result of our request to create a Lobby. At this point, the lobby has been joined and is ready for use.
